title: Verdict reached for rapper accused of shooting Megan Thee Stallion
description: A jury in Los Angeles reached a verdict in the trial of rapper Tory Lanez, who was facing charges for allegedly shooting and injuring hip-hop star Megan Thee Stallion.

title: Feds: Jan. 6 participant arrested after California standoff
description: A participant in the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol has been taken into custody in Southern California after an hours-long standoff

title: Alaska lawmaker with Oath Keepers ties eligible for office
description: An Alaska judge has ruled that a state lawmaker with ties to the far-right Oath Keepers group is eligible to hold office

title: Flu starting to wane in US after brutal start to season
description: Flu is decreasing in many parts of the country after an alarmingly early and strong start to the season

title: Shell to pay $15.9 million settlement to Nigerian communities impacted by oil spills
description: Shell has agreed to pay $15.9 million to communities in Nigeria impacted by four oil spills that occurred from its pipelines in the Niger Delta between 2004 and 2007.

title: Americans could face death penalty for allegedly torturing foster child in Uganda
description: An American couple living in Uganda accused of torturing their 10-year-old foster child could face the death penalty if convicted of child trafficking, prosecutors said.

title: House passes $1.7T spending bill, sending measure to Biden, averting shutdown
description: The bill includes defense spending, aid to Ukraine and reforms to the Electoral Count Act with bipartisan support.

title: US hits milestone of more than 100M COVID-19 cases: CDC
description: On Thursday, the U.S. hit officially more than 100 million COVID-19 cases, but experts say this is likely an undercount of the true number of infections.

title: WATCH:  Adorable toddler begs her dad for a kiss under the mistletoe
description: “Need a kiss,” 2-year-old Sarai told her dad.

title: Landfill fire near Birmingham burning for almost a month
description: An underground fire has been raging at an environmental landfill near Birmingham for almost a month, covering Alabama’s largest metro area with smoke

title: Question raised in multibillion-dollar lawsuit over Elon Musk Tesla tweet
description: A judge in a lawsuit over a tweet Elon Musk sent in 2018 about Tesla has asked for an explanation about a calculation.

title: Patients sue hospital after being allegedly sexually assaulted by nurse
description: Two women who say they were sexually assaulted by a nurse are suing his former employer for negligence, claiming the hospital should have known about the misconduct.

title: Will FTX traders get their money back? Bankruptcy experts weigh in
description: Creditors in FTX's multibillion dollar bankruptcy could number more than a million.

title: Congress inches closer to passing $1.7T spending bill as House prepares to vote
description: The bill includes defense spending, aid to Ukraine and reforms to the Electoral Count Act with bipartisan support.

title: SEC says it's not violating Elon Musk's right to free speech
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is denying allegations that it is violating Elon Musk’s free speech rights by trying to enforce a 2018 securities fraud settlement

title: Mega Millions surpasses half a billion dollars
description: Mega Millions jackpot has risen to $510 million.

title: An inflation measure watched by the Fed eases to 5.5%
description: A measure of inflation closely watched by the Federal Reserve slowed last month, another sign that a long surge in consumer prices seems to be easing

title: 2 dead, 4 hurt in Paris shooting: Prosecutor
description: Two people were killed and four injured in a shooting in Paris on Friday, the city's prosecutor said.

title: Former Santa Monica mayor dies in small plane crash on beach
description: Officials say a former mayor of Santa Monica, California, died after a small plane crash-landed and flipped upside down on a beach in the coastal community

title: Democrats close legislative year with final swipes at Trump: The Note
description: Consider the ways in which Trump was rebuked and rebuffed:. His taxes were exposed; his actions around Jan. 6 were called out

title: Ukraine president back in Kyiv, Russia keeps up attacks
description: Zelenskyy sounded another defiant note on his return.

title: Truck carrying Indian soldiers falls into gorge, killing 16
description: A truck carrying Indian soldiers has skidded off a road into a gorge in the country's remote northeast, killing at least 16

title: US threatens Taliban with 'costs' after school ban for Afghan women, girls
description: Blocking girls from elementary schools is the latest blow to female rights.

title: Notorious French serial killer freed from Nepal prison
description: Confessed French serial killer Charles Sobhraj was freed from prison.

title: N Korea fires ballistic missile days after US-S Korea drills
description: South Korea's military says North Korea has fired a ballistic missile toward its eastern waters, its latest weapons demonstration that came days after U.S. and South Korean warplanes conducted joint drills that North Korea viewed as an invasion rehearsal

title: 'A very hard road ahead' for China as COVID-19 cases spiral
description: Nearly three years after the coronavirus was first identified in China, it is now spreading through the country and experts predict difficult months ahead for its 1.4 billion people

title: Alex Jones' motion to set aside Sandy Hook verdict denied
description: A Connecticut judge has denied Infowars host Alex Jones’ motion seeking a new trial and the overturning of a jury verdict requiring him to pay families of victims of the Sandy Hook Elementary School shootings

title: Passengers evacuated after Staten Island Ferry engine fire
description: Emergency personnel have evacuated nearly 900 passengers from a Staten Island Ferry vessel following a fire in the ship’s engine room

title: Trevor Bauer reinstated by MLB's independent arbitrator
description: Trevor Bauer has been reinstated by Major League Baseball’s independent arbitrator, allowing the pitcher to resume his career at the start of the 2023 season

title: House Jan. 6 committee releases final report on probe into Capitol attack
description: After interviews with hundreds of witnesses, the House committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol has released its final report.

title: Public advised to be on lookout for cold-stunned animals
description: Residents in parts of the U.S. are advised to be on the lookout for turtles, pelicans and other animals impacted by the unseasonably freezing temperatures.

title: ACLU of New Mexico sues Albuquerque over treatment of homeless
description: The American Civil Liberties Union of New Mexico is suing the city of Albuquerque over its treatment of the city’s homeless population.

title: Arizona Gov. Ducey agrees to dismantle makeshift border wall
description: Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey has agreed to deconstruct the makeshift border wall his administration has been building

title: Title 42 actually contributes to increased migration numbers, data suggests
description: What is the real impact of Title 42 and how could it contribute to record border crossings?

title: WATCH:  Artist creates mural celebrating Argentina's World Cup victory
description: An artist in Buenos Aires created a larger-than-life mural of Lionel Messi and the Argentinian soccer team celebrating their World Cup victory.
